desc: Your destination for hand crafted aromatherapy and cosmetics, curated fashion and gifts.

layout.text:
H﻿ere at In The Garden Candles and Gifts we have an appreciation of nature and the simple beauty of it. We strive to use locally sourced and American made, preferring to use small businessess over big box stores and including natural and repurposed elements in our finished products.
Take a moment In The Garden and find your solitude.
